lines.i: The Complications section records problems that occurred during the procedure or other activity. The complications may have been known risks or unanticipated problems.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8174, CONF:10384 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15453)/@code="55109-3" Complications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15454)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8795, CONF:8796)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
There SHALL be a statement providing details of the complication(s) or it SHALL explicitly state there were no complications. (CONF:8797)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15453)/@code="55109-3" Complications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15454)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8795, CONF:8796)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
There SHALL be a statement providing details of the complication(s) or it SHALL explicitly state there were no complications. (CONF:8797)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1833210015"/> <code code="796951377"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="12040982"/> <code code="1978020983"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1273582405"/> <code code="669059130"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1539197064"/> <code code="308349836"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="144193745"/> <code code="1111795344"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entry> </section>
